testimonials.text: Matt not only handles his tasks and responsibilities in an efficient and effective manner, but is also among the first people colleagues go to for problem solving and assistance. This is due to his broad knowledge as well as his ability to communicate his thoughts and ideas clearly to those both inside and outside of his department and functional area. Matt always shows commitment to improvement of himself as well as his peers. Matt would be a great addition to any team.

I just wanted to drop a note on what a great job Matt W. did with the electronic fair work week tracker for operations. The time savings will allow us to shift resources to Philly and Chicago roll outs.  Matt presented to ops today and they are also very excited to get this rolled out.  We will be starting the pilot in NYC within the next few weeks. I really appreciate you giving us the ability to streamlines this process; Matt really thought outside of the box to come up with a great solution that appeared to take little resources.  It is a big win for all of us.
testimonials.user: Stacey Arledge in a message to my manager
